name: Great Battles of World War II: Stalingrad
name_original: Great Battles of World War II: Stalingrad
description:
Great Battles of World War II: Stalingrad is a strategy game developed by DTF games. It came out on 03-12-2004. Black Bean Games published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Great Battles of World War II: Stalingrad is available on PC.
